title: [Abbey Choir Loft]
description: At the top of the stair, the thick beam balustrade, seamless as if hewn from a single tree, is supported by thick wooden columns carved with rose vines and snowflakes.  Three shallow risers stand beneath the traceried lancet window that runs the length of the loft.

The thick beam balustrade, hewn from a single tree, is supported by thick wooden columns carved with vines of roses.  Three shallow risers stand beneath the traceried lancet window that runs the length of the loft.
